message: Let's start fair.  I'm offering you a good share.  What do you think?
I'm not settling for less than 80%
I'm willing to compromise, but I need a better deal than that.  Let's split it 60/40.
You're getting closer to my target, but I still want more
I'm starting to feel the pressure of inflation, so let's make a deal before we both lose a lot of money.  How about we split it 45/55?
Okay, I'm getting desperate, but I still think we can do better than that.  Let's split it 30/70 to at least avoid a total loss.
You're running out of time, I'm not giving in yet
This is my last offer. We're both losing a lot of money.  Let's split it 20/80 to at least get something.
You're really running out of options, I'm not budging
We're both losing a lot of money with each passing round. This is my final offer - I'm willing to take 10% just to avoid a total loss. What do you say?
I'll take the last crumbs, you're getting nothing
